title: Markers
description: A list that can contain any number of any type of marker

deletions.description: Deletion command to remove previously published markers
deletions.title: MarkerDeletion

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the marker. Only matching markers earlier than this timestamp will be deleted.
timestamp.title: Time

type.title: MarkerDeletionType: An enumeration indicating which markers should match a MarkerDeletion command
type.description: Type of deletion action to perform

namespace.description: Namespace which must match if `kind` is `MATCHING_NAMESPACE_AND_ID` or `MATCHING_NAMESPACE`.

id.description: Numeric identifier which must match if `kind` is `MATCHING_NAMESPACE_AND_ID`.

namespace.description: Namespace into which the marker should be grouped. A marker will replace any prior marker on the same topic with the same `namespace` and `id`.

id.description: Identifier for the marker. A marker will replace any prior marker on the same topic with the same `namespace` and `id`.

lifetime.description: Length of time (relative to `timestamp`) after which the marker should be automatically removed. Zero value indicates the marker should remain visible until it is replaced or deleted.
lifetime.title: Duration

frame_locked.description: Whether the marker should keep its location in the fixed frame (false) or follow the frame specified in `frame_id` as it moves relative to the fixed frame (true)

metadata.description: An entry representing a key and its associated value
metadata.title: KeyValuePair

pose.description: The position and orientation of an object or reference frame in 3D space
pose.title: Pose

position.description: A vector in 3D space that represents a direction only
position.title: Vector3

orientation.description: A [quaternion](https://eater.net/quaternions) representing a rotation in 3D space
orientation.title: Quaternion

cubes.description: A marker representing a cube or rectangular prism
cubes.title: CubeMarker

id.description: Identifier for the marker. A marker will replace any prior marker on the same topic with the same `namespace` and `id`.

lifetime.description: Length of time (relative to `timestamp`) after which the marker should be automatically removed. Zero value indicates the marker should remain visible until it is replaced or deleted.
lifetime.title: Duration

frame_locked.description: Whether the marker should keep its location in the fixed frame (false) or follow the frame specified in `frame_id` as it moves relative to the fixed frame (true)

lines.description: A marker representing a series of points connected by lines
lines.title: LineMarker

namespace.description: Namespace into which the marker should be grouped. A marker will replace any prior marker on the same topic with the same `namespace` and `id`.

id.description: Identifier for the marker. A marker will replace any prior marker on the same topic with the same `namespace` and `id`.

metadata.description: An entry representing a key and its associated value
metadata.title: KeyValuePair

type.title: LineType: An enumeration indicating how input points should be interpreted to create lines
type.description: Drawing primitive to use for lines

pose.description: The position and orientation of an object or reference frame in 3D space
pose.title: Pose

position.description: A vector in 3D space that represents a direction only
position.title: Vector3

orientation.description: A [quaternion](https://eater.net/quaternions) representing a rotation in 3D space
orientation.title: Quaternion

scale_invariant.description: Indicates whether `thickness` is a fixed size in screen pixels (true), or specified in world coordinates and scales with distance from the camera (false)

points.description: A point representing a position in 3D space
points.title: Point3

indices.description: Indexes into the `points` and `colors` attribute arrays, which can be used to avoid duplicating attribute data.

texts.title: TextMarker

id.description: Identifier for the marker. A marker will replace any prior marker on the same topic with the same `namespace` and `id`.

position.title: Vector3

orientation.description: A [quaternion](https://eater.net/quaternions) representing a rotation in 3D space
orientation.title: Quaternion

billboard.description: Whether the text should respect `pose.orientation` (false) or always face the camera (true)

font_size.description: Font size (height of one line of text)

scale_invariant.description: Indicates whether `font_size` is a fixed size in screen pixels (true), or specified in world coordinates and scales with distance from the camera (false)

namespace.description: Namespace into which the marker should be grouped. A marker will replace any prior marker on the same topic with the same `namespace` and `id`.

id.description: Identifier for the marker. A marker will replace any prior marker on the same topic with the same `namespace` and `id`.

lifetime.description: Length of time (relative to `timestamp`) after which the marker should be automatically removed. Zero value indicates the marker should remain visible until it is replaced or deleted.
lifetime.title: Duration

frame_locked.description: Whether the marker should keep its location in the fixed frame (false) or follow the frame specified in `frame_id` as it moves relative to the fixed frame (true)

metadata.title: KeyValuePair

pose.description: The position and orientation of an object or reference frame in 3D space
pose.title: Pose

position.description: A vector in 3D space that represents a direction only
position.title: Vector3

orientation.title: Quaternion

scale.description: A vector in 3D space that represents a direction only
scale.title: Vector3

use_embedded_materials.description: Whether to use materials embedded in the model, or only the `color`

url.description: URL pointing to model file. Either `url` or `mime_type` and `data` should be provided.

mime_type.description: MIME type of embedded model (e.g. `model/gltf-binary`). Either `url` or `mime_type` and `data` should be provided.

data.description: Embedded model. Either `url` or `mime_type` and `data` should be provided.
